title: Grand Canyon National Park: Guest Speakers
body: Guest Speakers         Rangers can visit your classroom and conduct presentations on many subjects.   Classroom Rangers Would you like a park ranger from Grand Canyon to visit your classroom?  In January and February each year, the park's environmental educators travel throughout Arizona, southern Utah, and the Las Vegas area, conducting educational classroom activities and school assemblies.   All programs are curriculum-based (based on Arizona State Education Standards) and free of charge. Topics include geology, ecology, pioneer history, and archaeology.  If you have questions about the Classroom Rangers program contact us.   Â    2016-2017 Classroom Rangers Information Sheet (327kb PDF file)  2016-2017 Classroom Rangers Registration Coming soon!
